alert.note: Alert for Corson; Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 02 at 9:11AM MDT until August 02 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR CORSON AND DEWEY COUNTIES IN NORTH CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA... * AFFECTED AREA...In South Dakota, Corson and Dewey. * WINDS...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds, low humidity, and dry fuels will bring critical fire danger to portions of north central South Dakota.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
